title: Layout
description: Allows you to display a layout section driven by the layout string notaiton like "1 1 2 _ 3 3 2"

frontspec.description: The frontspec.json that you must have at your project root

id.description: Specify a uniqid to apply to the layout

layout.description: Specify the layout you want in layout string notation by media (mobile, etc...). Default layout must be stored under the "default" media

content.description: The grid content to print. Must have the same count of div(s) as your layout cells
